content.question: The artist included abstracted references to apocalyptic events so that viewers would reflect on the

choices.label: delivery of divine justice during the Last Judgment
sense of alienation experienced in the modern city
changes brought on by new developments in the arts
lack of order and meaning in the universe

content.answer: changes brought on by new developments in the arts

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
